75 TEST_FILE("ltc_6813-1.c")
76 
77 /*========== Definitions and Implementations for Unit Test ==================*/
78 /* SPI data configuration struct for LTC communication */
79 static const spiDAT1_t spi_kLtcDataConfig = {
80  /* struct is implemented in the TI HAL and uses uppercase true and false */
81  .CS_HOLD = FALSE, /* The HW chip select signal is deactivated */
82  .WDEL = TRUE, /* No delay will be inserted */
83  .DFSEL = SPI_FMT_0, /* Data word format select */
84  .CSNR = 0x0, /* Chip select (CS) number, 0x01h for CS[0] */
85 };
86 
87 /* SPI interface configuration for LTC communication */
88 SPI_INTERFACE_CONFIG_s spi_ltcInterface[BS_NR_OF_STRINGS] = {
89  {
90  .pConfig = &spi_kLtcDataConfig,
91  .pNode = spiREG1,
92  .pGioPort = &(spiREG1->PC3),
93  .csPin = 2u,
94  },
95 };
96 
97 SPI_INTERFACE_CONFIG_s spi_ltcInterfaceSecondary[BS_NR_OF_STRINGS] = {
98  {
99  .pConfig = &spi_kLtcDataConfig,
100  .pNode = spiREG1,
101  .pGioPort = &(spiREG1->PC3),
102  .csPin = 2u,
103  },
104 };
105

108 }

110 void tearDown(void) {
111 }

113 /*========== Test Cases =====================================================*/
114 void testCommandArrays(void) {
115  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdWRCFG);
116  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdWRCFG2);
117  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDCFG);
118  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDCVA);
119  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDCVB);
120  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDCVC);
121  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDCVD);
122  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDCVE);
123  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDCVF);
124  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdWRCOMM);
125  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdSTCOMM);
126  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDCOMM);
127  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDAUXA);
128  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDAUXB);
129  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDAUXC);
130  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDAUXD);
131  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADCV_normal_DCP0);
132  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADCV_normal_DCP1);
133  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADCV_filtered_DCP0);
134  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADCV_filtered_DCP1);
135  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADCV_fast_DCP0);
136  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADCV_fast_DCP1);
137  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADCV_fast_DCP0_twocells);
138  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADAX_normal_GPIO1);
139  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADAX_filtered_GPIO1);
140  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADAX_fast_GPIO1);
141  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADAX_normal_GPIO2);
142  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADAX_filtered_GPIO2);
143  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADAX_fast_GPIO2);
144  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADAX_normal_GPIO3);
145  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADAX_filtered_GPIO3);
146  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADAX_fast_GPIO3);
147  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADAX_normal_ALLGPIOS);
148  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADAX_filtered_ALLGPIOS);
149  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADAX_fast_ALLGPIOS);
150  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_BC_cmdADOW_PUP_normal_DCP0);
151  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_BC_cmdADOW_PDOWN_normal_DCP0);
152  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_BC_cmdADOW_PUP_filtered_DCP0);

154 }
